parameters.name: content_id
parameters.description: Format ID is assigned after registration is successful

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The login API is valid; users is directly sent passwords to OpenAPI.

response_fields.name: text
response_fields.description: Original pure text of the text. Empty is no error happened.

response_fields.name: timestamp
response_fields.description: Original pure speech in the text. Empty if no error happened.

response_fields.name: result_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an ASR request by each speech.

response_fields.name: time_start
response_fields.description: Each time interval can be start tag.

response_fields.name: time_end
response_fields.description: Each time interval can be ending tag.

response_fields.name: status
response_fields.description: Name of the text in your language

response_fields.name: image_url
response_fields.description: The image url of this item

response_fields.name: channel
response_fields.description: The layout code representing the content and data of the text

response_fields.name: content_type
response_fields.description: The content type of the text in the being processed. Content_type=0

response_fields.name: original_type
response_fields.description: The original type of the text in the being processed

error_codes.description: These parameters {0} must is not empty in list

notes: This appears to be an API for video summarization or text extraction from video content. It includes comprehensive error handling and response fields for timing, content status and metadata.
